### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Key Pressed

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/key_pressed).

Checks if the entity is actively using a keybind on their client.

Type ID: `apugli:key_pressed`

---

### Example
```json
"condition": {
    "type": "apugli:key_pressed",
    "key": {
        "key": "key.use",
        "continuous": true
    }
}
```
This example checks if the entity is continually holding the `key.use` keybind.
